LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.SmartStore.Shopwahl

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Feeds.ShopwahlProductXml

LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.Feeds.ShopwahlProductCsv

LocaleResource.Name: AdminInstruction

LocaleResource.Name: DemoModeHint
